author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

Added consumes calls to ESProducers and switched them to use ESGetToken. 
In addition, stopped holding copies of the PSet and instead hold the necessary values.

This is meant as a technical change and should not cause any changes in behavior.

#### PR validation:

The code compiles.
title: Added consumes to ESProducers in TrackingTools/Producers
